DataElement.preferredName: Pathology Specimen Central Reviewer Submission Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indication as to whether or not a pathology specimen has been submitted for review.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: related to a sample of tissue, blood or urine collected for research and sent to one or more persons specializing in the nature and cause of disease to critically evaluate and report test results.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A specialty concerned with the nature and cause of disease as expressed by changes in cellular or tissue structure and function caused by the disease process. (MSH98):Specimen; a bit of tissue or blood or urine that is taken or used for research purposes.

Concepts.definition: The medical science, and specialty practice, concerned with all aspects of disease, but with special reference to the essential nature, causes, and development of abnormal conditions, as well as the structural and functional changes that result from the disease processes. Informally used to mean the result of such an examination.

A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.

Property.preferredDefinition: A single person who critically evaluates and reports on laboratory test results, protocols , or other data.:Submission; a message submitted for the judgment of others.

Concepts.definition: A single person who critically evaluates and reports on laboratory test results, protocols, or other data.
Something submitted for the judgment or consideration of others.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown/not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable.

Concepts.longName: Yes, No, Unknown, or Not Applicable Response
Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable.
